title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Swift Destruction of Hezbollah Terror Infrastructure in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked and destroyed terror infrastructures in Lebanese territory less than two hours since the last attack.

Within less than two hours of the last attack, fighter jets attacked again the terror targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanon.

As part of the attack, several terror infrastructures of the organization were destroyed alongside an observation post in the areas of Markaba, Al-Taiba and Maron Al-Ras in Southern Lebanon.

Also, in the last few hours, a number of launches were identified crossing from Lebanese territory towards the north of the country.

IDF forces attacked the sources of fire alongside other areas in Lebanese territory.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3UqkDbk
